title: Portfolio Optimization using Predictive Auxiliary Classifier Generative Adversarial Networks with Measuring Uncertainty. (arXiv:2304.11856v1 [q-fin.PM])
abstract: In financial engineering, portfolio optimization has been of consistent interest. Portfolio optimization is a process of modulating asset distributions to maximize expected returns and minimize risks. To obtain the expected returns, deep learning models have been explored in recent years. However, due to the deterministic nature of the models, it is difficult to consider the risk of portfolios because conventional deep learning models do not know how reliable their predictions can be. To address this limitation, this paper proposes a probabilistic model, namely predictive auxiliary classifier generative adversarial networks (PredACGAN). The proposed PredACGAN utilizes the characteristic of the ACGAN framework in which the output of the generator forms a distribution. While ACGAN has not been employed for predictive models and is generally utilized for image sample generation, this paper proposes a method to use the ACGAN structure for a probabilistic and predictive model. translated_title: 利用预测性辅助分类生成对抗网络进行投资组合优化及不确定性测量
translated_abstract: 在金融工程中，投资组合优化一直是持续关注的问题。投资组合优化是一种调节资产分布以最大化预期回报并最小化风险的过程。为了获得预期收益，近年来已经探索了深度学习模型。然而，由于模型的确定性特性，传统的深度学习模型难以考虑投资组合的风险因素，因为这些模型不知道它们的预测有多可靠。为了解决这个限制，本文提出了一种概率模型，即预测性辅助分类生成对抗网络（PredACGAN）。提出的PredACGAN利用了ACGAN框架的特征，即生成器的输出形成一个分布。虽然ACGAN还没有用于预测模型，通常用于图像样本生成，但本文提出了一种将ACGAN结构用于概率和预测模型的方法。此外，本文提出了一种量化预测不确定性的方法，可以用于衡量投资组合的风险。实证结果表明，所提出的PredACGAN模型优于传统的深度学习模型，并为投资组合优化提供了更好的风险衡量。
tldr: 本文提出了一种名为PredACGAN的概率模型，用于投资组合优化中考虑预测的不确定性和风险的因素，并且通过实证研究证明了其比传统深度学习模型更优。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a probabilistic model called PredACGAN that considers the uncertainty and risk factors of predictions for portfolio optimization, and demonstrates through empirical research that it outperforms traditional deep learning models.
